title: Bug 102436: Date/time value not stored correctly in report design
description: An invalid date/time string (which does not conform to a universal format or the system default locale format) should have been rejected. However, it is not being stored correctly in the report design.
OB: The invalid date/time string '55/66/9999' is accepted as the default value for the 'DateTime' type report parameter in BIRT report designer.
EB: The report designer should reject the invalid date string '55/66/9999' and not allow it to be stored as the default value for the 'DateTime' type report parameter.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the BIRT report designer.
2. Create a new report.
3. Add a 'DateTime' type report parameter.
4. In the 'Default Value' field of the report parameter, type in an invalid date string such as '55/66/9999'.
